text:
I keep getting the following error when I try to access the docs on how to 
setup mod_jk2 for apache2.

You don't have permission to access /builds/jakarta-tomcat-
connectors/jk2/release/v2.0.0/doc/jk/aphowto.html on this server.
creator: bsamani@samani.com

text:
There are no directions on how to setup Apache on how to point Apache to 
Tomcat to process the  servlets. there is only a limited amount of docs on 
seting up mod_jk2, but none on how to setup APache to talk to tomcat. Is there 
a URL for this kind of Documentation?
creator: bsamani@samani.com
